properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 14.
1. 14 METER S/V ANEGADA, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
   ON BOARD, DISMASTED AND ADRIFT, REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE  IN 14-26.5N 056-08.5W AT 110021Z DEC.
   VESSELS IN    VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
   TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
   FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3991/17.
